2d0007bc5ad11988d4b3d019fe2fecbd (03:08): it's the easiest way to make a cross-browser embedded flash object in the least amount of user code
95cc64dd2825f9df13ec4ad683ecf339 (03:08): well i did exactly what author says
95cc64dd2825f9df13ec4ad683ecf339 (03:09): there are other factors that might prevent code working

95cc64dd2825f9df13ec4ad683ecf339 (03:10): currently i set it for one only
6735c9ab9b1ac69d7d2f449177128eca (03:11): first off, each one must have a unique ID, and the final swfobject.replace call or whatever it was must use separate IDs for each
6735c9ab9b1ac69d7d2f449177128eca (03:11): I also found it worked better when I used a different varname for each swfobject as well
